description: UMD 3.14.10 is an emergency update of the third Major release of UMD. In particular, it contains an update for YAIM core for SL6.
releaseNotes: This release adds the YAIM core package 5.1.4.
installationNotes: All products in UMD 3.14.10 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
changeLog: This release adds YAIM core for SL6.

products.name: cern.yaim-core
products.releaseNotes: This release provides a backward compatible fix for GT4_INSTALL script name change and for the broken "join" command on CentOS/EL 7. Aslo added recognition of CentOS/SL/EL 7 and fixed CentOS 6 line
